title: The stock market is down, but these 4 tech companies prove there's still good news out there - TechCrunch
content: The stock market is down, but these 4 tech companies prove there's still good news out there  TechCrunch
description: We took a look at earnings results from Cloudflare, Confluent, Amplitude, and Appian to gauge how the market is treating even results that seem pretty darn solid.
